name: UICollectionViewUpdateItem
desc: An object that describes a single change to make to an item in a collection view.

items.name: var indexPathBeforeUpdate: IndexPath?
items.desc: The index path of the item before the update.

items.name: var indexPathAfterUpdate: IndexPath?
items.desc: The index path of the item after the update.

items.name: var updateAction: UICollectionViewUpdateItem.Action
items.desc: The action being performed on the item.

items.name: enum UICollectionViewUpdateItem.Action
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of action being performed on an item.
